page.title: 09THE DOWTY GROUP p.l.c.
page.content: { Dowtys}was formed in 1931 by{Sir {George Dowty}with just Â£30 capital.It was called{The Aircraft Components {Company.}In 1935 Sir George bought {Arle Court}which is now the company headquarters. After the war the company expanded and consists of Dowty Fuel Systems, Dowty Seals,Dowty Hydraulics,Dowty Mining,Dowty Rotol,etc..A total of {14,415 people}are employed,mostly in the Cheltenham area. { Arle Court}is mainly offices concerned with organisation and design. Nearby is the company{recreation {ground}with many sports and social facilities.Every year there is a big sports day which involves many local people.
